text: Hello! How are you tonight (today?)? Weather decent where you are?
Hi, I am doing great tonight and yourself ? Weather is a bit warm still
I'm doing pretty well. It's been pretty cloudy and wet here so I'm glad for the sun
That is good to hear what country are you in ?
I'm in the US. Pretty far north luckily. I've some friends in Texas, and they were sending me stories of the asphalt melting. How about you? Where're you at roughly?
I'm up in the PAC NW currently.
Oh, I had to Google that acronym. Is that a common phrase out there? I've never heard it
I think so. Anyways wondering if there are any good charities for children there where you are ?

Haha, yea, there's one in my area that I love. It gives kids with disabilities the chance to participate in sports - skiing especially. The prompt I have here is for Save the Children though. Are you familiar with that charity?
Yes I have sent some donations online to that charity.
Oh, awesome! I'm only vaguely familiar with them myself, but I visited their site just now and it's really encouraging seeing what they're doing
Yes indeed, I believe they are based out of the UK though

Well that would explain why I've never encountered a local event. How willing would you be to donate to them today? The requester will send whatever you give their way. I think you have up to $2.00 you can give
I normally donate $1.00 to help them expand their network and capabilities.
Hey, every bit helps. Whatever you're willing to give, I'm certain they'd be happy to have it. But you've donated to them before. You'd know better than I would
Sounds good would you like to match my donation today ?

Hmm, I'm not certain that I have the capacity to do that in this task. My prompt is just to get you to donate, but you knew the charity already and made that easy. Let me reread this. I could be mistaken
Ok well I will donate $1.00 to the Save the Children. Thanks for your time.
Awesome! You have a great night. Thanks for chatting with me
You too, take care!
